# 15_page


```{python}
P = np.array([0.7,0.5,0.3,0.5]).reshape((2,2))

n = P.shape[0]

I = np.eye(n)
print(np.ones(n))
A = np.column_stack([P-I,np.ones(n).T])

b = np.append(np.repeat(0,n),np.array([1]))

v = np.linalg.solve(np.dot(A,A.T),np.dot(A,b.T))
```
